Key Match Events: Australia won by 8 wickets (with 32 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins: 'Marsh and Smith's form are good signs for Australia'
Najmul Hossain Shanto: 'We did not play our best at the World Cup as a team, in both bowling and batting. Want to look at what we can do better moving forward.'
Mitchell Marsh: 'I am sure my Nana and Mum and everyone will be watching at home, and hopefully they will have a smile on their faces.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh avoided damage to net run-rate and will likely qualify for Champions Trophy
Others: The match was played at Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Pune
The match was the 43rd of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
The Player of the Match was Mitchell Marsh
